description:
Discover and Demand movies you want to see on the BIGSTAR social VOD platform BIGSTAR movies you demand. 

Global access to thousands of unique movies and entertainment.

Watch foreign films, independent movies, film festival movies, cult favorites and more!

Unlimited movie viewing on almost any Internet-connected device. Including iPhone, iPad, Roku Player, WebOS, Yahoo Widget, GoogleTV, Android phone and tablet, and many more!

If you're looking for Hollywood movies this app isn't for you. If you love alternatives to the typical Hollywood flick, check us out!

Get a Free 30 day trial and $4.99 a month after that!
